divs: sighting detailsmy husband and my self lived in the mountains in quebec . about 7 mile from the usa border near vermont . it was early in the evening but was dark, but clear sky no moon when we looked towards the border and saw a large and i mean large moveing object comeing our way. dont know how high it was in the sky or if it was in orbert . dont think so but the funny part was it had this halo and it was comeing and then it turned and made a left turn and went over the mountain\ but right behind it there was a biger one and it did the same thing \ my feelings are that thay knew we were there as it was almost to our house maybe a mile away. we had a very good view of the hevens as we lived in the country\ no street lights \and we both saw many ufos many different shapes large and small, and other things in the sky\ one was like a small moon and it moved along the river one night\ i was in bed and i was looking out the window , i thaught that a funny place for the moon, so i got up out of bed and went down stairs and by that time it was in the trees . but it started to move and went over magog lake . so i called my daughter and told her to look out the back as she lives near the lake . she wouldet go out with out her husband . and when thay did thay watched it and it stayed over the lake for an hour, and start to move and it went right over there house and high speed and a big bang and a flash and it was gone i saw the flash but i dident hear the bang. there are a lot of sightings in that part of the country . well thats my story as i remember it . how it made me feel when i saw all of the siteings was i know there is other life form out there, dont know if thay are like us but with ships that size and speed that thay go and can stay in one piece \makes you wonder as for my daughter and her husband thay both landed on the porch floor on there buts\ and thay told me not to call them if i see any thing else and i never did even thoe we saw many more. thay had a hard time to get to sleep, as for me i still look up and watch all the time here in alberta \ as i moved here i know i will see more as i have the eye for them
